QuestData.Title: Shape Your Fate
QuestData.Description:
The whims of the spirits can be guided, I have seen it.
There were whispers of an item, a way to change the path of destiny. I heard dem, and I went looking. For many years I listened to those whispers on the wind until one day they showed me the way. This is what I offer you. It will take some time, and some valuable resources, but I can perform the ritual to allow you to control this power.
Well? Are you ready?
QuestData.LogDescription: Place a work order for a Seal of Broken Fate.

Objectives.Objective: Start a work order for a Seal of Broken Fate
